channel.title: How do you make it so it is on LAN not internet
channel.description: i am a boarder in a boarding house and the IT people have blocked ports 43594 so we cant play RS or any online games but we are able to play through LAN so if someone could help me out with that that would be good...And also i am using deltascape and when i am not able to log in because when i run the server in CMD it comes up with a continual amount of NULLS popping up down the CMD line... so yeh plz help me out ..cheers :cool:

item.title: How do you make it so it is on LAN not internet
item.dc:creator: @Da_Vinci Da Vinci
item.description:
@Da_Vinci wrote:

I think this’ll work, I haven’t tested it though but I’m positive.
First, run your source as you always do.
Now in your client instead of connecting to an IP adress connect to: ‘‘localhost’’

Good luck.

Leo.

Read full topic
